text:
="preserve">Curtis S. Person Jr. (November 27, 1934 – September 4, 2020) was an American politician. He was born in Memphis, Tennessee. He was a member of the member of the Tennessee House of Representatives from 1966 to 1968. He also was a member of the State Senate from 1968 to 2006. Person Jr. was a member of the Republican Party.
Person Jr. died on September 4, 2020 in Memphis at the age of 85.
